about_the_game:
The Battle Cry of Freedom Supporter Pack is your chance to elevate your gaming experience and show your support for the game. This optional DLC grants you access to a wealth of new historical music instruments, including the Saxhorn, Tuba, Bass Drum, Trombone, and Cornet. All songs were recorded by professional musicians using real instruments, ensuring authenticity and high-quality audio.



As a bonus, you'll also be able to play as the Drum Major and lead your troops into battle wielding the Tambour Major Baton. You'll have access to the US Marine Corps Band, the Virginia Military Institute Band, and the US Cavalry Brass Band, giving you a wide range of options to choose from.

Features:
• Access to the US Marine Corps Band
• Access to the Virginia Military Institute Band
• Access to the US Cavalry Brass Band
• Play the Tuba, Saxhorn, Cornet, Bass Drum, or Trombone
• Use the Tambour Major Baton and lead your band
• Experience historically accurate, professionally recorded music.

Show your support for the game and enhance your gaming experience with the Supporter Pack DLC. By purchasing the Supporter Pack, you'll be directly contributing to the development of new features for Battle Cry of Freedom.
